comments:
There are different errors in the .log when opening and closing projects in the latest I-build.

When opening an existing Web project I receive the following error:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.resources 4 2 2007-01-19 16:27:57.234
!MESSAGE Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-in: "org.eclipse.core.resources".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException

java.lang.NullPointerException

+1

One problem appears to be that StructureEdit.getStructureEditForRead on line 497 may return null, but this is not checked for.  Whether it returning null in this is situation is an expected cause is another issue....
Closing as part of mass query to clean up old resolved bugs in untargetted milestones.
